description:
Bell defeats the minotaur and becomes the fastest adventurer to level up in history.  After his success, Bell is given the nickname "Little Rookie." As he sets his sights on the middle floors of the dungeon, Ryuu tells him that if he wants to succed, he`s going to need a bigger party.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鍛冶師[ヴェルフ・クロッゾ]
